name: Socialtools.me SA
description: Developer of a tool designed to allow brands to build and run any kind of promotion. The company's tool allows companies to easily install raffles, image contests and a collection of more than 20 applications on their Fan Page, enabling agencies and marketers to attract more fans, increase interaction with their audience and boost the company's sales through From Facebook.
